forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 20. South southwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow between 7am and 11am, then a chance of snow and a chance of freezing drizzle and a slight chance of drizzle. Cloudy, with a high near 35. South wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Snow then Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before midnight, then a chance of rain between midnight and 1am, then a chance of freezing drizzle and a chance of drizzle. Cloudy. Low around 32, with temperatures rising to around 34 overnight. South wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle before 7am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 45. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 19, with temperatures rising to around 24 overnight. Southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow between 7am and noon, then a chance of rain between noon and 1pm, then a chance of snow between 1pm and 2pm, then a chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy. High near 35, with temperatures falling to around 33 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy. Low around 28, with temperatures rising to around 30 overnight. South wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday

forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 7am. Partly sunny, with a high near 36. West wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 13, with temperatures rising to around 20 overnight. Southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow between 7am and 3pm, then a chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 34. Southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow likely. Cloudy. Low around 27, with temperatures rising to around 29 overnight. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 7am. Partly sunny, with a high near 35. West wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: All trails power-tilled flat with a classic track and wide skate deck. Conditions are very good.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks Run was spectacular today with the beautiful blue sky day! Thanks to the wonderful crew who works so hard on making snow and grooming!

nubsNob.liftsOpen: All 8 chairlifts, Rope Tow and Conveyor.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be packed this morning. Coverage and grooming are very good.
nubsNob.comments: There was a strong wind last night that is predicted to calm down considerably today. The snow surface is machine groomed and some drifting snow could be encountered. Conditions are still very good as we head toward Christmas. Pintail Peak is open. The Pintail Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. NASTAR racing begins at 12:30 on Birch Run. The soup of the day is beef, mushroom and potatoes. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
